snippet.title: Clockwork Damage Official Trailer
snippet.description:
START THE COMBAT! Download now for FREE one of the best action shooter games!

Use TONS of letal GUNS and POWER UPS to fight your way through Victorium!

Clockwork Damge in 9 words: RISE above all others and become the ULTIMATE SOLDIER!  

And best of all? It's a free twin-stick shooter game to pass the time with your FRIENDS!

FEATURES:

★ DOZENS of CHAPTERS and HUNDREDS of thrilling MISSIONS
★ Different GAME MODES
★ Tons of letal GUNS and mortal POWER UPS
★ SHRED wave after wave of ENEMIES
★ Suit up your CHARACTER with different and extraordinary COSTUMES
★ ADDICTING gameplay
★ PLAY and COMPETE against your FRIENDS for the best score
★ Rise to the TOP of the monthly LEADERBOARD
★ Regular UPDATES with more FREE CHAPTERS, guns and non-stop action!
★ Play it ANYWHERE. Doest not require to be online in order to HAVE FUN. 

But that’s not all, there’s much more clockwork damage fun tucked inside - so go ahead, install Clockwork Damage today. It’s action packed, free, and one intense adventure!

Visit our official site at http://hailstudios.com/
Follow us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/hailstudios or like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/HailStudios/ to get more info about Clockwork Damage.+

Check out our videos and game trailers on https://www.youtube.com/user/HailChannel
